work that you do to take care of a house, for example washing, cleaning etc
I spent all morning doing the housework.
housework.translation[0].note_box[0].ite: Housework is an uncountable noun and is not used in the plural You say
I help my mother with the housework
I help my mother with the houseworks
Housework is followed by a singular verb
All the housework was  done by him
